page.title: 15My Area
page.content: I live in Brockley and it is a very nice place to live.It is like a little town and there are lots of shops and it has lots of houses and at the back there are flats.The houses are fairly big and there are three schools in the area and I went to one of them and the name is Brockley Junior School.There is a train station in the area and it is not that big.They have platforms and railway tracks and if you touch the railway tracks you will get electricuted.It is quiet and the shops are in a row and some are big and some are small.There are sweet shops and they have newspapers and drink and toys and sweets like Milky way and Cherry drops and 1p sweets and some shops have things on the window telling people things.The roads are very long and they have white lines.The houses are fairly big.They have a garden and bedrooms and
